This four-armed faceless woman has flesh that appears to be made of pale marble veined with traceries of blue lines.
Metallic plating and stone make up this creature's body. Sharpened brass wings stretch from its back, and its head bears three faces.
This creature looks like a mechanical centaur. Golden, clockwork wings sprout from its back, and its arms end in barbed chains.
A cyclopean face stretches grotesquely across the hub of a tall, knobby wheel of bone.

This slender humanoid is clad in a severe black leather harness and long skirt decorated with curling twists of wire. Her eyes are colorless orbs, and tears of blood course down her cheeks. Slender surgical lancets pierce her body in numerous locations, yet these wounds do not bleed.
A single eye peers from behind the armor plates and keen-edged blades that compose the cage-like exterior of this tiny flying orb.
All the skin has been scraped from this childlike humanoid's frame, revealing cords of gray musculature. Its eyes burn with a red glow.

Amid a roiling cloud of deepest dark, the rattle of chains and heavy footfalls announce a being of immense size. An infernal, gasping hiss draws the darkness back, revealing a tortured, four-legged fiend of exposed bone and ragged flesh draped in chains. Barbs and hooks hang from these wrought iron bands, matching the fiend's tail as they writhe like snakes in search of prey.
This blood-soaked humanoid is festooned with razored shards of metal. Skeletal wings protrude from its bleeding shoulders.
At the core of this multi-limbed monstrosity of claws and blades struggles a glistening mass of veins, organs, and twisted flesh.
Ragged wounds on one side of this leather-clad humanoid's face and body mark the transition between flesh and shifting shadowstuff.
This willowy, blue-skinned figure wears robes of draped chains. Its exposed skin is pierced with lengths of razor-sharp, bloodstained icicles.
The golden bones of this magnificent skeleton are clad in monstrous face-skins sewn into a cape and skirt adorned with gold pendants.
Cloaked in shadows, every curve and sculpted muscle of this creature suggests some new gasping pleasure or titillating torture.
This imposing humanoid is clad in black chainmail with a featureless helm. It clutches a serrated dire flail in its gauntlets, and several pairs of manacles on its belt writhe of their own accord.
Chains and piercings torture this being's bloodless flesh. The greatest violations invade its face and mouth.
Bladed whips and spiked chains sprout from the stumps of this humanoid torso's amputated limbs. Elongated saw blades loll out of its distended mouth.
This hovering iron maiden heaves forth a monstrously pregnant mass of tortured limbs and raw tentacles.
Wickedly barbed chains adorn this lean figure, and gaps in the bindings reveal deathly pale flesh etched with jagged scars.
A stirring in the air and rustle through the room reveals a presence - a subtle aura both cautious and curious.

A beast leapt forth from the flames of Hell, this gigantic, three-headed hound howls a sound like the cacophony of a raging wildfire. Large enough to heft a horse in its monstrous maws, this terror bears no flesh, its body merely a thing of exposed bone and charred musculature. From its three fanged mouths leap tongues of flame, and crimson saliva leaks from the terror's skeletal jaws.
This elderly figure looks out with heavy-lidded eyes, and seems lost in its own serenity.
A toned, regal human radiates a shifting aura of many colors and murmuring voices that seem strangely familiar.
This regal, apparently human figure has glowing purple eyes and the grace and fluidity of water given form.
Cerulean light surrounds this towering four-armed figure in a vibrant corona.
This short, iron-skinned horse is surrounded by a flickering light. A preternatural intelligence glitters in its metallic golden eyes.
This majestic tiger has white fur with deep blue stripes. It glows with divine radiance and radiates an aura of calm.
This crimson horror walks upon six long, thin legs. Its face is neither that of a skull nor spider, but some horrid mix of the two.
This humanoid-shaped figure of folded paper and silken ribbons hovers gently in the air. It wears the open cover of some great tome like a metal- and leather-bound mask.
This emaciated, robed humanoid wields a scythe made of bone to match the skeletal wings that protrude from its shoulders.
This hideous creature has a jet-black segmented body, four beady eyes, batlike wings, and a pair of oversized mandibles that glisten with green ichor.
This spiderlike monstrosity watches quietly, skittering about on six needle-sharp legs.

monsters_unique.title: Unique Monsters
description: # Names and Descriptions
{table0}
# Names and Stats
{table1}

data: Stony segments cover this towering colossus like armor plates. Though it looks lifeless, its four arms move with supple grace.
This humanoid creature has the head of a ravening, horned lion. A chorus of anguished screams echoes from his gaping maw.
This beautiful female sphinx appears both wise and thoughtful.
This lithe, otherworldly woman has with deep brown eyes and dark green hair that cascades past her waist. She's adorned in trinkets made from a great white pine's needles and cones.
This gray-skinned woman wears a royal gown that exposes the top of a jagged incision down the middle of her chest.
This swarm of droning black flies teems in the semblance of a winged angel with glowing red eyes.
This humanoid wears a shabby hooded cloak. Within the darkness of its hood, eerie eyes glow and strange shapes twitch.
One half of this figure's body is gleaming and beautiful with an angelic wing, while the other is scaled, scarred, and blackened.
This diabolic figure is draped in a kingly robe and crowned with iron horns. He bears a long, heavy mace of black metal.
This tripartite being has three humanoid bodies engulfed from the waist down by a tangle of three immense serpents.
This shining being is humanoid, but its four arms, multiple legs, and horned head reveal its diabolic nature.
This red-skinned devil has three sets of curving horns atop his brow and three mismatched pairs of wings.
This immense figure appears to be a suit of blackened, diabolic armor filled with shrieking blasts of blistering fire.

This hunched-over, vaguely humanoid creature has gauntly muscled biceps beneath a sandy hide and coarse fur. Its head is that of a jagged-toothed antelope, the face spotted with rot and sand slowly sifting out from between the fibers of its hair, and its legs end at the shin in stumps of charred flesh.
This pale woman is as beautiful as she is menacing-her smile promises endless bliss, yet her weapons and fangs drip with blood.
A man with curling ram's horns sits astride a snorting, stamping black warhorse, gripping a dark, battle-worn spear.
A man with fiery red hair and antlers rides a red-gold stallion. His robes expose the hairy legs of a goat, ending in cloven hooves.
A tall, handsome woman sits astride a white horse. She grips an elegant longbow made of raw birch.
Balravnus, Lord of the Deep Pools

This lumbering toadlike demon wields a blood-soaked halberd in its powerful hands - one of those hands is clad in a rusting jagged gauntlet, while on the beast's misshapen head perches a leering helm made of greasy green metal.
This shabby-cloaked figure is surrounded by hundreds of bees.
This towering four-armed demon carries an evil-looking scepter in one of its two human hands - the other arms end in pincers.
This enormous creature's serpentine neck supports a leering reptilian head - its body is a wriggling mass of tentacles.
This alabaster-skinned man holds a rapier made of intricately carved crystal and wears armor made of the same material.

This woman with vaguely half-elven features wears a wooden breastplate and wields a wooden morningstar in one hand. In her other hand she holds a thorny red rose; blood from that hand trickles down her arm.
This humanoid fiend has an overly long torso, black eyes, and a mouth full of razor-sharp teeth. It wears black robes that cover most of its rotting, frostbitten flesh.

A rustic hut stands here, its timber walls hung with bundles of drying herbs and etched with eerie symbols. From beneath its splintering wooden porch extends a pair of legs, like those of a fifteen-foot-tall chicken with gigantic talons caked in mud but sharp as razors.
Fire burns on the central horn and in the rheumy eyes of this bestial winged demon, who stands more than twice a human's height.
This demon's body is a nightmare of writhing tentacles and slippery coils below the leering maw of a deep sea predator.
Larger than an elephant, this towering insectile nightmare wields a scythe made of bone. Its wings are swarms of biting flies, and its inhuman eyes glitter with cruel intelligence.
This towering giant with twisted legs has human skulls woven into his beard and holds an immense warhammer.
This frighteningly majestic creature spreads wide her runeadorned wings. Molten iron weeps from her hooves, and her three tails are studded with barbs.
Held aloft by four great feathered wings, this hawk-faced fiend has a scorpion's tail and carries a black metal scepter.
This stork-headed, winged humanoid is spattered with blood and wields a pair of gory, razor-sharp daggers in his dripping hands.
This gaunt woman has blood-soaked hair, eyes and lips stitched shut with wire, and severed limbs that float nearby as if they were still attached.
This hulking, four-armed, four-headed, sting-tailed gargoyle stands as tall as a house.

The air fills with the sound of hissing snakes as a giant, severed snake's head floats into view, with a gaping mouth and twin fangs dripping virulent poison. Its eyes are milky and blind, but its forked tongue constantly tests the air for fresh scents. Below the head, where a body should be, numerous hissing serpents thrash like tendrils of torn flesh. Blood drips from the severed head, sizzling as it burns like acid through anything it touches.
Blue-gray wings extend over the jeweled bangles and gossamer veils of this androgynous angel.
This graceful humanoid woman wears a flowing gown of sparkling starlight and a circlet of moss.
This living silhouette of a graceful woman has white hair and eyes. Her butterfly wings shimmer with twinkling stars.
This tall, graceful person has elven features, the horns of a majestic stag and a piercing, ageless stare.
This serene, acrobatic man has stiff sideburns, a beard like a monkey, and three golden-furred tails.
This towering angelic general has five wings of fire, a flaming bastard sword, and resplendent golden armor.
This red-winged angel is blindfolded and wrapped with bloody bandages. What shows of her flesh is scarred with celestial runes.
Erotundee, Keeper of the Risen Light

This wretched demon combines the worst features of a deformed boar and a repellent hag, then somehow manages to make things worse by decorating the whole with an ugly patchwork of scars and a rancidly obese body.
Garbed in tattered robes, this emaciated humanoid creature stares out with unblinking white eyes. In one hand, he clutches a great blade, while his other hand holds an idol of some fell power.

Dressed entirely in gray worn robes, a tiny, otherworldly man stands cloaked in mysterious shadows, his head crowned by a mane of wild, fiery-orange hair and his green eyes gleaming with madness and delight.
This towering, burning demon wears black, spiky armor and carries two weapons - a jagged sword and a whip of flames.
Wielding a net of woven moss and a stone javelin, this humanoid reptile wears armor of swamp reeds and bone and the skull of a larger reptile as a menacing mask.
The size of a bull elephant, this red-and-black arachnid has a bloated body and spindly legs, made all the more horrifying by the all-too-human appearance of its baleful visage.
aquatic, chaotic, extraplanar, Great Old One
This great reptilian monster is an aquatic lizard with a beard of tentacles and a sting-tipped tail.
This towering impossibility, neither quite octopus nor dragon nor giant but something far worse, must surely herald the end of times.
An insane tangle of eyes and mouths, arms and legs, tentacles and worse rises up upon itself, a mountain of madness come to life.
This entity appears to be a skeletal human form hidden under tattered yellow robes, but it moves with unsettling, inhuman grace.
air, chaotic, cold, evil, Great Old One
This looming humanoid shape has long, gangly limbs, glowing red eyes, and a gaping mouth full of fangs.
Eight pairs of crystalline legs support this enormous volcano. The volcano's crater constantly spews smoke and roiling lava.
chaotic, evil, Great Old One, incorporeal
This massive wormlike creature appears to be made of solid darkness that sucks surrounding light into its body to be forever extinguished.
aquatic, chaotic, evil, Great Old One
This six-legged, spiderlike monstrosity has a bloated abdomen and a hideous face from which three bulbous eyes glare.
A gray robe and veil obscure this humanoid's form, save for a foaming mass of bubbles and tentacles extending from below.
Neither quite humanoid nor quite toad, this lumbering monstrosity maintains a malevolent expression on its batlike face.
A hideous tangle of hairlike fungal filaments writhes with nauseating purpose. Bones lie tangled in the wriggling mass, arrayed around a central draconic skull.
This green-scaled humanoid has a long, serpentine neck and head, and its brow is marked by a distinctive crescent shape.

Shards of broken manacles, links of chain, and iron flails are imbedded in this hideous, human-sized man's ruddy flesh. Rivulets of congealing blood run from its soaked cap down its mangled face and neck, soaking its tangled white beard; in its arms looms a rusty but clearly sharp scythe.
This cloud of swirling energy flickers like lightning, with raw magical power playing across its form.
This comely man is clad in fine silken robes. His eyes smolder with infernal flames.
A long crimson cloak drapes over the form of this large faceless being, which floats just above the ground on footless legs as its menacing flail crackles with blue currents of electricity.
This creature's body rises from the ground in an amorphous mass of grave dirt and eroded bone. Its upper half is humanoid-shaped and wields an enormous pick made from a giant's rib and skull.

This ancient stone giant towers over others of his kind and has a crown of crystalline growths sprouting from his head. He holds a warhammer made of meteoric stone pierced by natural deposits of glinting metallic ore.
This tall angel has a halo of spinning blades, and is clad is radiant golden armor and equally radiant shield.

This clockwork termite is the size of a rhinoceros and has an oversized head with a humanoid face on it. Multiple apertures along its body sprout tool-wielding limbs, and a human-sized hatch on its abdomen chitters and clicks like a menacing maw.

This skull is as large as an ogre and surrounded by buzzing flies. Its bat wings are too small to actually carry it, yet it moves through the air as easily as a bird. It is surrounded by the stink of rotting meat, spice, and perfume.
Jagged bolts of lightning crackle within this massive and vaguely humanoid storm cloud.
Skulls adorn the armor of this winged woman. Her helm reveals nothing of her features but a pair of glowing eyes.
This platinum-skinned, four-armed angelic being glows with the power of the sun. He bears two flaming scimitars and a bow.
This immense reptilian beast towers over its surroundings, all teeth and horns and claws and thrashing spiked tail.
This defiant, angelic woman has two black wings and three white wings, and bears a crystalline halberd.
Harsh flourishes decorate the armor of this ironclad giant, as though it were the war regalia of some merciless warlord.
Made of polished iron, this mighty golem resembles a keen-eyed dwarf. It carries a warhammer and a shield bearing Torag's symbol.
This gigantic stag-like being blurs the line between plant and beast, its horns branching like the limbs of some ancient, leaf less tree.
This gangly black wasp has delicate wings, articulate hands on its front legs, and a pair of jagged stingers the length of a human arm.
This bald old human man has long white eyebrows and an even longer white beard. He carries a staff adorned with metal rings.
This heavenly warrior appears to be a work of art come to life. She grips a fearsome glaive that trails brilliant colors.
This towering, scorpion-tailed man stalks with a soundless grace and murderous intent.
This muscular figure has a skeletal ram's head and a cloud of flies spews from his mouth.
This ancient figure is dressed in black, and its eyes are sunken pits that glint with malevolent cunning.
This blond woman's pitch-black eyes weep tears of blood, and a massive pair of raven's wings spreads from her shoulders.
This starving-thin man has a trio of jackal's heads with jagged, crystalline teeth. His oily black flesh ripples disturbingly.
This lithe, shadowy creature is obviously feminine, yet the talons and horns leave no doubt as to her fiendish nature.
Clad in mithral and furs and armed with a glowing sword made of ice, this towering, blue-skinned humanoid has a regal presence.
This two-headed monstrosity has vast wings and a long tail covered in a forest of blades.
The armored plates of this immense, three-tailed scorpion are fiery red, and its stingers glow with molten heat.
This towering saurian lumbers on its hind legs, its twin tails thrashing and the spines on its back glowing with red energy.
This immense, fiery-orange serpent has three horned heads, a pair of draconic wings, and a long tail tipped with four bony spikes.
This mountain of filthy green sludge heaps up on itself, extending six tentacles and unfolding its core to reveal a single red eye.
This immense pale blue worm raises one end of its body like a serpent, its many-toothed maw opening amid a ring of glowing eyes.

Growing from the back of a horselike beast is the torso of a sea hag with grossly elongated arms and large, clawed hands. Its tangled web of stringy hair does not hide the disturbing fact that the hideous creature has no skin, and is built of gore and viscera.
This serpent-bodied, six-armed woman is painfully thin, haggard, and gaunt. Bloody sores dot her flesh, and the skulladorned flails she wields drip black liquid.
This slender, seductive woman has bone-white skin and an otherworldly beauty.
This withered humanoid wears sooty, fire-blackened robes and a headdress of black and gold.
This large creature has the upper body of a winged woman and the lower body of a snake. She looks withered, like a preserved corpse.
This impeccably formed man has ice-blue skin. Bleeding icicles pierce his lips and form a jagged cloak around his waist and legs.
This devilish humanoid has five horns growing out of his forehead that resemble a crown. He stands on stout cloven hooves.

Standing amid a roiling fog, this nude, humanoid woman's pale, wet skin glistens. Her long, dark hair moves about her head as though she were submerged underwater, and rapier in her hand crackles with arcane energy.
This enormous, ebon-skinned giant is covered in glowing red runes and exotic plate armor.
This leering, single-horned demon seems emaciated even clad in black dragonhide armor. A viscous layer of crimson slime glistens on its flesh, dripping over its armor in red rivulets.
Attired in various hides and with pauldrons made from the tusks of a mammoth, this towering, one-eyed humanoid wields an equally massive flat club.
This strange, four-armed fiend appears to be constructed completely out of stone. Dried blood stains its body.
Twin talons attached to grotesque back-appendages drip blood from this hideously emaciated, jackal-legged albino demon.
This gray-haired man with a short, wiry beard wears a nondescript robe festooned with satchels and decorations.
This bloated, pinniped-like mammal is covered in salty grime, and its sturdy, blunt tusks promise an agonizing death.
The elephantine creature is titanic in scale. Curving tusks frame its flexing, muscular trunk and its canyon of a mouth.
This creature has the bulbous eyes of a fish, and his mottled green skin glistens with slime where it isn't bedecked in gaudy jewelry.
This blue-skinned giant is outfitted in elegant jewelry and white robes, and wields a lightning-infused spear.
This stocky giant has a flaming mane and facial hair, his massive armor and fiery glaive indicating his prowess as a warrior.
A wicked scar runs the length of this blue-eyed, apish humanoid's face, and he wields a dislodged tree trunk as a club.
Black spines run down the length of this lanky, reptilian creature's back, and short wings protrude from its hunched shoulders.
A series of metal rings rotates around a giant prismatic sphere.
Phoenix, Pyralisia, the Rain of Embers
This giant ebon bird is streaked in lines of fiery embers and red lightning, clouds of black smoke billowing behind it.
Feathered arms emerge from the shoulders of this hunched raven, clutching a key of bone.
This furry hominid's orange eyes blaze not with fury but with wisdom, and the white hair around its face is streaked with gray.
This towering, steaming mass of slithering entrails drags ropes of mouthed intestines below his five spidery legs.
A cloud of smoke the size of a human condenses, forming a clot of tentacles and eyes surrounding a fanged mouth.
The sides of this tentacled monstrosity-part jellyfish, part mushroom forest-swell with opaque, pulsing blisters.
This sluglike creature leaves a swath of tar wherever he goes, and his upper body opens into a gaping, sludge-dripping mouth.
Writhing, hook-covered tentacles unfurl from this behemoth's body, at the center of which gapes a maw with a red eye in its throat.
This brainlike creature has two clawed legs emerging from its fore and rear and a serpentine proboscis clutching a dagger.
This sagely stone giant wears loose furs and a long cloak, and wields a large stone club covered with crystals.
This spined dragon has black scales that pulse with green light. Her tattered wings show a starscape that whirls in mad patterns.
This mangy horselike beast walks perversely upright. Wings, a dragon's tail, and a fanged mouth complete its vile appearance.
This purple-haired giant has dark bronze skin and piercing eyes; she wields an electrified trident and a coral-encrusted shield.
This crimson-haired demonic woman has wings of fire. She carries a slender bow made of flames.
This four-armed nightmare stands with an elegance that seems out of place, given its demonic visage. Huge black wings fan behind its back, and flickering black blades burn in its hands.
Spawn of Rovagug, Chemnosit (The Monarch Worm)
This massive beast possesses a mouth of rasping teeth and tentacles with biting mouths. In the center of its maw rests a glowing evil eye.
Spawn of Rovagug, Festering Ulunat (The Unholy First)
This immense creature's warty body is shaped like a many-pointed star, and from it sprout nearly a dozen different wings.
This gloriously plumed anthropomorphic eagle has feathers tipped with shimmering gold, and claws with sharp black talons.
This towering, gray-skinned giant holds a massive spear, its crimson haft sporting a head of barbed and blackened stone.
This immense, eyeless worm is covered in a midnight blue hide. Four barbed tongues wriggle out from its open, lily-shaped maw.
This owlbear seems lean and especially mean, and moves with a spookily silent grace.
This arching, reptilian creature has an elongated neck and short fins. Its jagged teeth hint at its primordial nature, and the abundant plant growth covering its body suggests both fertility and rot.
This colossal serpent's skin is like that of decayed, bruised corpses. Cancers rupture from its flesh, and a terrible sickening flow of black blood oozes from each break and sores.
This blue-skinned elf has milk-white eyes, a glowing punching dagger, and a shield embossed with a demonic face.
Clad in ancient leather and bronze and a great horned helm, this withered gray figure is surrounded by a palpable aura of death.
This gray-skinned dwarf wears iron plates over a set of purple and magenta robes and carries a warhammer.
The twenty-foot-tall winged saurian demon wields an acid-dripping axe. Two red eyes glow above a tooth-filled beak.
This humanoid figure is garbed only in leather straps wrapped around her translucent skin, as well as scattered pieces of armor. She wields a wicked two-pronged blade.
A host of tentacles - some tipped with eyes and others ending in mouths - flail around a massive spiraling maw ringed with thousands of teeth.

Though mostly covered in grime-encrusted black fur, the muscles of this creature are still plainly visible along the four forearms that emerge from its split elbows. It wears a crude bone necklace that dangles under its vertically oriented mouth.
This fierce and feral-looking woman has huge wings and clawed hands and feet, and carries a wicked-looking longbow.
This heavily scarred, towering giant wears the hide of a black dragon, and wields a massive club studded with dragon's teeth.
This writhing terror is made of tentacles and the heads of multiple hounds. The figure of a beautiful woman extends from the monster's center, though its fiendish visage is far from welcoming.

This vulture-headed demon has crimson wings and a baleful third eye in his forehead. He is clad in lengths of chain and metal plates, and carries a cruel-looking sword in one hand and a glowing sphere of violet crystal in the other.
Thick of limb and torso, this towering female frost giant possesses powerful blue muscles and wields a massive, ice-encrusted battleaxe.
Blasphemous pages cloak this creature's gaunt, winged form. Within its depthless hood burns a vortex of otherworldly flame.
This breathtaking, giant-sized woman's raven hair falls to her ankles. Her skin is as pale as the glowing moon, and her ebon eyes deeply pensive.
This woman with four armor-clad arms and wings of incandescent magma has the lower torso of a powerful reptile.
This fiendish figure appears to be shaped from pure flame with a feline face. Three wicked tongues dart from the creature's mouth.
Balravnus, Lord of the Deep Pools
Phoenix, Pyralisia, the Rain of Embers
Erotundee, Keeper of the Risen Light
Spawn of Rovagug, Chemnosit (The Monarch Worm)
Spawn of Rovagug, Festering Ulunat (The Unholy First)

monsters_mythic.title: Mythic Monsters
description: # Names and Descriptions
{table0}
# Names and Stats
{table1}

data: A foul mist surrounds this huge, three-eyed, tentacled fish creature, and plates of hardened slime guard its body.
This towering humanoid has a strange, stony head. Small, mechanical wings spread out from its back.
This muscular humanoid possesses a hawk's head and large, bird-like wings. It is dressed in robes crafted from opalescent scales.
An unnerving, buzzing drone emerges from a creature resembling a tortured human half transformed into a giant, winged scorpion.
This misshapen giant is covered in horns, tumorous tentacles, unsightly warts, and strange, staring eyes.
This towering humanoid creature is made almost entirely of gold and radiates a warm light.
This creature appears to be a cross between a pixie and a bat with charred flesh. Around its waist dangle tiny fairy skull trophies.
This beast is an unsettling combination of chicken and lizard, and its claws, beak, and wattles seem made of stone.
This enormous monstrosity looks like a pile of fresh humanoid bodies shoved into a shambling humanoid shape.
A siege engineer's nightmare, this giant machine emits noxious fumes from its grinding engine.
This stone edifice resembles a lion with a regal human face, garbed in royal clothing.
This immense stone figure appears to be a keep that uprooted itself and went for a walk.
This gigantic construct looks like a walking mansion, its body and limbs composed of various rooms.
This enormous one-eyed humanoid has a horn protruding from its forehead and fists the size of tree trunks.
This snake-bodied fiend has a six-armed woman's torso, pointed ears, and glittering, otherworldly eyes.
A towering, corpulent beast, this fiend has the hideous head of a boar and arms ending in fatty, four-fingered hands.
A cloud of spores and a trail of feathers surrounds this twisted cross between a man and a gigantic vulture.
Each of this mechanical horror's four monstrous limbs ends in a terrible weapon.
Merging the most horrifying features of carrion-fed insect and withered cadaver, this bony devil moves in unsettling lurches.
A pair of frozen, multifaceted eyes coldly judge all before this towering, insectile monstrosity.
This sinuous and stinking dragon is covered in black scales, with massive horns curling up from its head.
Miniature bolts of electricity and a cloud of swirling sand surround this dragon's hulking, blue-scaled body.
Strange shapes dart about within the acrid fog surrounding this green-scaled dragon, and a large horn rises from its snout.
A ruddy glow emanates from beneath this dragon's red, gem-encrusted scales, like lava visible between cracks of cooling stone.
A ruddy glow emanates from beneath this dragon's red, gem-encrusted scales, like lava visible between cracks of cooling stone.
This dragon's white, ice-encrusted scales glitter like diamonds as it effortlessly makes its way across the snow.
This woman's upper body is shapely and beautiful, but her lower body is bloated, with pulsating tumors and writing tentacles.
This living tornado draws in all the air that surrounds it, hurling unrestrained objects as it moves.
This humanoid mountain of stone and earth strides forward on legs like pillars, a vast grove covering its back.
This blazing conflagration is vaguely humanoid in shape, its horned visage almost too bright to look upon.
Thousands of gallons of water rise up to become a tentacled face, a bulbous body, and four long tentacular appendages.
This one-eyed being is a strange mix of insects, fungi, and other living things shaped into a single winged entity.
Flies buzz around this bestial, two-headed giant, and maggots squirm in the folds of its skin.
This living stone statue takes the shape of a horned and winged humanoid, and green acid drips from its mouth.
This giant's hair, beard, and skin are made of lava, and its armor and weapon glow with a dull heat.
Like barnacles made of rock, stone growths encrust the feet of this thick-bodied giant.
A mien of strange, primal beauty surrounds this woman, magnified by the inhuman tone of her skin and her bestial legs.
Electricity constantly arcs between the bolts and rivets that hold this amalgamated creature's flesh together.
Haggard and hunched, this blind and snaggletoothed crone guides herself by a gruesomely bloated eyeball she clutches in her claws.
An eerie green fire emerges from the obscenely large mouth of this strange humanoid combination of bat and wolf.
This lurching hulk carries no weapons, but its eyes burn with menace, and its long claws are caked with blood.
This majestic beast combines the features of a sleek black eagle and the strong, lean musculature of a panther.
This golden lion towers over the trees, its six eyes watching every shadow and its mane shining like the sun.
This immense dragon coils its long, serpentine body beneath spreading wings, its eyes glittering like burnished gold.
This brawny hound is wreathed in flames, and its footsteps leave burning prints that sputter and smoke.
This brawny hound is wreathed in flames, and its footsteps leave burning prints that sputter and smoke.
Skeleton, Human Skeleton The pile of bones suddenly stirs, rising up to take on a human shape. Its long, bony fingers reach out to claw at the living.
This seven-headed serpent has serrated fangs, and moves with incredible speed despite its massive bulk.
A split in the trunk of this strange tree reveals a swirling magical portal to an unknown destination.
Resplendent lilac and white scales adorn this gigantic serpent. A number of sharp, short horns crown its head.
This creature has the head and upper body of a beautiful woman, the lower body of a lion, and long, serpentine tail.
This serene woman has pointed ears and flowing crimson hair, and wears an elegant dress and a crown of twigs.
This armored undead human wields a heavy mace and wears the trappings of a devil-worshiper.
This massive, red-skinned creature surges with roiling waves of brilliant fire.
This fearsome creature has the body of a lion, the wings of a dragon, the face of a snarling man, and a tail of dripping spikes.
This unnatural woman has scaled skin, white bird wings, and long snake-hair that hangs past her feet.
With eyes blazing red and magical runes glowing on its horns, this mighty beast has the body of a man and the head of a bull.
This regal mummy reeks of preservative spices and wears the clothing and jewelry of a wealthy pharaoh.
This towering beetle-like horror has thick carapace segments and massive mandibles that leak sizzling acid.
This immense, muscular giant wears heavy scale mail and wields a club adorned with a giant claw.
This enormous russet serpent has the head and forequarters of a ruddy bull with bronze horns and hooves.
This beast has the general size and shape of a great bear, yet the head and feathers of an owl.
This flaming bird burns as brightly as the sun.

Sent down by vengeful deities to punish communities that have offended them, plague swarms scour crops, terrorize populations, and lay waste to civilized lands. Normal means of dealing with vermin and pestilence don't drive them off, for these vicious and intelligent mythic swarms carry the destructive blessings of their gods, and breed at an exceptional rate until their spawn consume entire cities. They are single-minded in their devotion to carrying out the furious will of their deities.

Normal means of dealing with vermin and pestilence don't drive them off, for these vicious and intelligent mythic swarms carry the destructive blessings of their gods, and breed at an exceptional rate until their spawn consume entire cities. They are single-minded in their devotion to carrying out the furious will of their deities.

Normal means of dealing with vermin and pestilence don't drive them off, for these vicious and intelligent mythic swarms carry the destructive blessings of their gods, and breed at an exceptional rate until their spawn consume entire cities. They are single-minded in their devotion to carrying out the furious will of their deities.
This creature resembles an enormous, four-armed humanoid made of water. Its two faces move about its head independently.
Fine jewelry and clothing accentuate this tiger-headed figure's striped fur and formidable fangs.
This woman has the upper body of a human queen, the lower body of a lion, a snake-headed tail, and great eagle wings.
This godlike giant wears armor made of thick plates of blackened iron and wields a great bladed mace.
This godlike giant wears armor made of thick plates of blackened iron and wields a great bladed mace.
Standing upright and powerful, this mighty tree-person channels nature's fury into green energy in its gnarled hands.
This giant humanoid has massive tusks, warty green hide sprouting bone spikes, and forearms thicker than its meaty legs.
This amber-colored ooze contains the preserved larva of a giant insect, almost like a monstrous brain.
This armored humanoid has skin resembling white bone, carved with images of weapons and dragons.
This aristocratic figure could easily pass for human if not for the grave-pale skin, red eyes, and long fangs.
This giant wolf's fur is so white it's almost blinding to behold.
A terrifying darkness surrounds this giant wolf.
This serpentine dragon has huge wings, two taloned legs, and a tail stinger, and its blue scales are mottled with other colors.
This towering, spindly, four-armed entity appears to be made of stone and crystal, yet it moves with a fluid grace.

corruptions.title: Corruptions
description: | Corruption | Description |
| [Aboleth](/corruption/aboleth) | The veiled masters have long controlled countless minions in the Inner Sea region's political arenas. |

| [Accursed](/corruption/accursed) | A foul curse has a deep hold on your body and soul. Your resentment toward the one who cursed you has taken on a life of its own. You notice slights against you by everyone around you, and can gain solace only by punishing them. |

| [Amoral](/corruption/amoral) | When an otherwise upstanding person turns to evil deeds to achieve his goals - whether by accident, due to sinister influence, or through desperation - he begins to slip, every excuse and justification furthering his descent into evil. |
| [Deep One](/corruption/deep_one) | The waves call to you, like a siren's song echoing across crashing surf. |
| [Demonic](/corruption/demonic) | Close contact with the Abyss or demons clouds your mind and twists your body. |
| [Ghoul](/corruption/ghoul) | A hunger for the flesh of the living grows more every day, until every sentient creature seems no more than a meal. |
| [Hellbound](/corruption/hellbound) | The pit of Hell waits for your damned soul. |
| [Hive](/corruption/hive) | Your body is a vessel for an invasive otherworldly species that seek to spread across the stars and devour all other life. |

| [Lich](/corruption/lich) | Your attempt to transition into unlife has gone horribly awry and your soul is trapped. Lich corruption also works for becoming another sort of corporeal undead (except ghouls and vampires, which have their own corruptions). |

| [Lycanthropy](/corruption/lycanthropy) | There is a sound pulsing through your blood, a call to the wild and savage places of the world, where you are free to hunt and to kill to satisfy your bloodlust. You are filled with the desire to rend foes limb from limb with tooth and claw. |
| [Plagued](/corruption/plagued) | Disease can become a corruption when it causes long-lasting and physical changes to the body. |
| [Possessed](/corruption/possessed) | Whether it's an actual spirit or an alternate personality, another mind vies with you for control of your body. |

| [Promethean](/corruption/promethean) | Your body is slowly wasting away. As your body decays, you must gradually replace more and more of it with artificial components - corpse flesh, bone, wood, metal, or other exotic materials. |

| [Psychometabolic](/corruption/psychometabolic) | Those who survive a brush with cosmic phenomena, occult mysteries, or horrors from beyond the veil occasionally find psychic abilities awakening in their minds. Although potent, such power corrupts the body, subconscious mind, and emotions - often with disastrous results. |
| [Shadowbound](/corruption/shadowbound) | Darkness and fear are all that guide you. As the shadow consumes you, you are becoming a gaunt caricature of your former self, emptied of life and color. |
| [Vampirism](/corruption/vampirism) | You salivate when blood is spilled, and struggle against the urge to sink your teeth into the necks of friends and innocents. |
